name: Absent Minded
description:
In this game, the player assumes the role of a hard-working woman who wakes up in the morning. The sun shines on her, and she gets a text from a best friend to get a cup of coffee.

This prototype was made for the AdvXJam under the theme A Good Time.

We are part of our college game development group, Game Dev Técnico, which can be found here on Itch.io, and on Facebook, Instagram and, Twitter!
